title: Super Admin Setup
metaTitle: JetStream Super Admin Setup - Cell Management Platform
metaDescription: Set up your JetStream Cell management platform with secure OAuth2 authentication and configure your first super administrator account.

subtitle.text: Let's Setup Your Cell Management Platform

infoCard.title: Super Admin Setup
infoCard.description: As the first user, you'll become the Super Admin with full access to configure authentication, manage users, and control all Cell operations using our secure OAuth2 authentication system.
